title: Project Spotlight: John F. Simon Jr of Every Icon
description: Kevin is joined by John F. Simon, Jr of Every Icon fame, the code-based conceptual art created by John in 1997. John brings the historical project to an on-chain expression collaborating with Divergence and Fingerprints DAO.
dc:creator: Kevin Rose
itunes:summary: Kevin is joined by John F. Simon, Jr of Every Icon fame, the code-based conceptual art created by John in 1997. John brings the historical project to an on-chain expression collaborating with Divergence and Fingerprints DAO.
